description: The image features a beautifully decorated traditional oil lamp (diya) lit against a dark background. The lamp is adorned with vibrant colors and intricate designs, showcasing the festive spirit of Diwali. Surrounding the lamp are colorful petals and small oil lamps, creating an inviting and warm atmosphere. The overall design conveys a sense of celebration and joy associated with the festival of lights.

captions.background: The background is dark to emphasize the brightness of the oil lamp and decorations. The focus is on the diya, which symbolizes the light overcoming darkness.
captions.objects: A beautifully decorated diya is at the center, surrounded by colorful flower petals and small earthen lamps, creating a vibrant frame that encourages a festive feeling.
